title: And, Goodnight
lyrics:
Oh sleeper, my dreamer
I dream a dream for you
My dreamer, my sleeper
My dream's dream come true
I dream sweet love, a dream for you

From your baby boy blue

I dream sweet love, a dream for you

From your baby boy for blue

And I wanna sleep all day

And I wanna go away

Okay, I want to sleep all day with you





Fall deeper, fall deeper

Into sleep, my dreamer do

And I will be there with my sleeper

Dreaming beneath the moon



I dream sweet love, a dream for you

From your baby boy blue

I dream sweet love, a dream for you

From your baby boy for blue
